import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' function Address() { const [address, setAddress] = useState({ street: "", apt: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "" }) const updateStreet = (e) => { setAddress({...address, street: e.target.reset()}) console.log(address.street) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() } return(
) } export default Address
